extendedInfo.description: Part of the Stuff On series, published by HIT, this highly visual and up-front app presents drug information to young people in an engaging and interesting manner.It covers ecstasy and includes sections on: what the drug is, brief history of use, effects, dangers, the law, top 10 safety tips, what the young characters think of the drug and where to find more information and get help if needed.HIT was established in 1985 to reduce drug-related harm and set up one of the worldâs first HIV prevention projects for people who use drugs. It is one of the leading agencies in the world dealing with education, information and training about legal and illegal drugs.
